name: Freck The Original Freckle
about: What it is:A patented formula that creates the longest-lasting and most natural-looking faux freckles you can get..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:After years of obsessive development, Freck OG The Original Freckle entered the world in 2017 to reveal the most-realistic faux freckle. Itu2019s a simple product that lets you quickly and easily create perfect-looking freckles that sink into your skin or foundationu2014rather than sit on top like an eyeliner pencil.
ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water, Polyacrylic Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Ethyl Acetate/Cyclohexane, Acrylic Acid. May Also Contain: Red 40 (CI 16035), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Lightly apply as a cluster of dots, dipping your brush often. .-Allow the formula to sit and develop according to your skin tone. .-Here's where the magic happens: Copy and paste your freckles by tapping them out across your skin. ..Pro tip: .-Aim for lots of space between each tap to create the most natural-looking freckles with the quickest application.

reviews.review_text: I have natural freckles that are covered up by my base makeup. I bought this product to re-accentuate them. I knew they needed to be blended before purchasing. I immediately returned this item.   The design of the applicator is brainless. Freckles are round and irregular. Press down too hard? Now you have a freckle in the shape of a line.   Use a brown lipliner or eyeliner instead. Sharpen as pointy as possible. Swirl the tip in different directions to apply. Be sure to blend. Enjoy natural looking freckles with no help from this product.

I wish I could give 0 stars. MINUSCULE. I laughed, I was so surprised; it's not even the size of your thumb! As small as a 1 ml perfume sample. 30$ for this? Will return. I never write any comments on my purchases, and I am not a picky customer, but for this one I had to.

reviews.review_text: I really like this. One tube has lasted me 2 months and counting with daily use. I have another brand as well and I mix it up. I am quite fair skinned and have real freckles but theyu2019re sort of oddly dispersed (where I have a ton on one side of my face and on top of my nose, but they are way more diffuse and lightly colored on the other side). I like to even them out with this. They look identical to my real freckles when applied well. Sure, over the course of entire day I might have to touch up once, and yes itu2019s a small container, but I will continue to repurchase as it gives the most realistic freckles. I apply it, and either dab around with my finger to create more freckles, or leave it to set for a few seconds and gently tap a piece of tissue onto it to remove excess stain.

Used this product for two years now, I love it. The lasting isn't exceptional since it does get away easily when it's hot, but it feels so natural and make a beautiful result! Only the XL is worth in my opinion (had it for a year)

They look best when applied to bare skin, but then disappear if you apply foundation/concealer over top. If you try to apply overtop of your base routine it seems to lift the product off of your face?? I've tried different primers, foundations, etc, and it just looked soo patchy. I also didn't expect the consistency of this product - it's basically maybelline tattoo brow in a fancier package. Don't waste your money. reviews.review_text: Honestly it took me several attempts to come around to this but now I absolutely love it! This lets me add in extra in places that are bare and they look completely natural! The first few times I used it I thought they were way too dark for my skin (my natural freckles are like a light caramel colour) but I realised I just had to pat my finger overtop much more to thin them out. I tend to add them on my temples, my forehead, and the bridge of my nose, and they last all day on top of my skin tint. One star off for the price of the product in comparison with the size, and the packaging- the lid on my tube (I have the smaller size) has cracked from I guess being closed too tightly but I feel like this shouldnu2019t have happened as easily as it did.

reviews.review_title: god tier: better than anti aging goop!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hyper natural OR! Bold! Thereu2019s a choice!   Iu2019m hardcore about sunscreen these days so I lack my natural freckles most of the year. I missed them a TON! Ironic because as a kid I was covered in freckles and very tan from being outside all the time and I hated it :oP  I guess itu2019s a good sign that beauty standards have changed! Now 30 odd years later, Iu2019m 40 and have been using Freck for about 6-7 months. Itu2019s SUPER easy to get good results and over time using it regularly youu2019ll be a freckle MASTER, fs!!!!  I love how easy it is to bolster my natural freckle pattern, OR if I want to go for a bold anime look BAM there it isu2026 just be more precise, let them set longer, add a second layer with no dabbing (first layer dabbed) so they donu2019t look *too* cosplay for every day!  Seriously though - this is better than 1000 anti aging products for skin or concealer for that lack of sleep! Freckles with some dewy skin bring out the youthfulness everyone craves!  Last thing is the price and packaging: 1. Just be conscious and gentle with the bottles! Donu2019t over screw them. I cry for all the people banging their expensive makeup products up (u2018: 2. It might seem expensive for the size, but consider the cost of you mascara or eyeliner!! This goes WAY FURTHER than either of those! Seriously the mini OG was my first purchase in a LE pack with the blush & itu2019s still going!  I bought the XL just for easier handling. One thing to note is the XL seems a tad darker and redder so idk if the formula changed but I got used to it quick.   TLDR: if you like freckles and are dying for the youthful sun kissed glow but go hardcore on sunscreen or just donu2019t sprout your own, GET THIS, it will change everything. No more bronzer, no more anti aging creams, just take care of your beautiful skin *MWAH*

reviews.review_text: My daughter received this in a beauty box subscription.  She has lovely natural freckles, so she gave it to me to try.  I do like the concept, but concept and practice, are two very different things.  I received what I assumed was a sample size.  WRONG! I checked the Sephora website because I was considering purchasing the regular size.  The small size contains .045 oz. or 1.35 mlu2019s of product for $22. That is approximately $489 for ONE OUNCE! For $6 more, youu2019re receiving about 2.4 times the product! The total size is .11 oz. or 3.5 mlu2019s of product for $28! That equates to $308 for a full ounce!  That is absurd.  The cosmetics industry has an average markup of 700%.  I donu2019t know what the manufacturing costs are, Iu2019m speculating, but I would assume this has, at least, an 800% markup.  This product is a self-tanner.  You can easily take a small lip liner brush and strategically apply your preferred self-tanner in the same manner shown.  I donu2019t have any issue investing in great skincare and beautiful makeup, but this is a ridiculous product that is grossly overpriced.  Hard pass!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Freck XL is, in theory, an awesome product. I used to use a brown pencil eyeliner for freckles/to darken beauty marks for years. Pros of this product: easy to use, great applicator, freckles stay put. Cons: so expensive for such a puny amount (like why?), the pigment is very red/warm (unless this is your undertone, the freckles look unnatural).  I hope that brands start making more faux-freckle products so there is an array to choose from. LimeCrimeu2019s freckle pen is also really great, but more like a marker tip and less precise. I use a combination of that pen and this one.   I will likely try the noir version in the futureu2014 hoping it has more of a cool/ashy undertone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. I always wanted freckles and this is a beautiful way to get them. They look natural, last all day, and itu2019s so easy to use. Iu2019ll be buying more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite freckles product! I love it so much because itu2019s easy to apply and looks so natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It makes an effortless natural freckle look but it doesnu2019t stay. At the middle of my day they have all disappeared and also itu2019s a little bit to transparent. I put it over my foundation so maybe it stays better on direct skin? Anyway for me using a eyebrows pen is still the better way to go so it lasts all day!

reviews.review_title: Good, but expensive with a learning curve
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good product, but I'm not 100% sure I would purchase again.   Pros: It's extremely long lasting; truly smudge proof. The colour is very realistic - assuming you apply it correctly, it really does look natural.   Cons: The application can be tricky - I find that even if I shake it a lot, when I apply it, it looks like I dipped a speck of brown ink on my face. In order to make it look natural, I have to blot it, and sometimes this doesn't work and I have to start over, which is kind of a waste of product. It's also extremely expensive for not that much quantity.   Basically, if you're looking for a smudge proof faux freckle applicator that looks natural and you're willing to put in the effort to figure out the best application approach for you, it could be worth it. If you just want to create fake freckles but are not as concerned with having to reapply, I think a freckle coloured lip pencil (ex. MAC Chicory) is probably a better/more affordable option.

reviews.review_title: Effective - but the size/price ratio is off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When applied properly, Freck is effective in mimicking natural freckles. I found it best to work in small sections before stamping out the dots across my face. One or two dips into the tube were enough to cover my cheeks with  enough freckles to credibly pass as a natural effect, which is quite sweet looking. I do like how it can make a look appear more natural; even with foundation it allows for a more u201cnakedu201d skin look.  For the price, the product is shockingly small, and having bought the XL I cannot imagine the size of the original. While only a small amount is needed per application, it still feels like the sizing could be more generous.  A word of caution - using a makeup setting spray will turn the product bright red on your face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not good if you have textured or oily skin. Smeared and rubbed off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i LOVE LOVE LOVE the concept and honestly pretty much love the product. only things i would change is the price cause it is a bit ridiculous for such a tiny thing and sometimes i feel like the product sinks into my skin and gives me more of a red tinge where the freckles were

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 29$ for a sample size. Havenu2019t tried the product so thatu2019s why Iu2019m giving it 2 stars instead of one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start with saying - I have freckles and dark spots all over my face. I grew up in Hawaii and used to think I was u201ctoo coolu201d for sunscreen during my formative years like an idiot. As a result, my natural freckles and dark spots are very uneven and cluster in random, unflattering areas. I get so self conscious in the summer because I feel like my freckles call attention to the parts of my face I dislike highlighting - mainly, my nose and upper forehead. Freck is my holy grail. I stamp a few clusters to even out the gaps where I donu2019t have any. It makes me feel more confident, which both my husband and my best friend said sounded silly. I tried explaining it as the freckle-equivalent of concealing your dark circles or evening out redness. Itu2019s easy to apply - just dot on in a cluster, wait 3-5 seconds, then tap and copy/paste over the area to make it look more natural. I knocked one star off because it is expensive, and the Light-Medium color is slightly more red than my natural freckles, which tend to lean ashy. Iu2019ve started contouring my natural freckles with Freck so that the red tone is scattered. I went through the mini size pretty quickly, so I purchased the XL which is lasting much longer. Anyway, I use it almost daily. Even on no-makeup days, Iu2019ll still put a couple of Freck clusters on because it looks natural over just my skin care routine. Basically, if you suffer from sun damage and discoloration and you want something to reliably even your skin out, I canu2019t recommend Freck enough. Iu2019m including a photo highlighting which are my natural clusters and which are Freck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first Received the package in the mail I was astounded by the size of the teeny tiny box. Donu2019t be fooled by the size of the bottle a little bit goes a really long way! Itu2019s very easy to apply and looks super natural. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Took me a good couple tries to figure it out but applying it on my finger and then using my finger to place it looks SO natural. Exactly what I was looking for to add something extra to my look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works as described but not worth the $$. A brow pencil works just as well for cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Freaking ingenious! Yes, it's tiny, but it WORKS. It does exactly what it claims to do, and it does it well. I'd never tried to give myself freckles before, so I thought this product might take some fiddling to get right, but nope; it was easy and worked perfectly on the first try! It was so quick and easy to apply and my freckles looked super natural. I'm so impressed with this product! Also, although the amount you get is tiny, you only need such a tiny amount to achieve the desired effect that I suspect even the small size will last quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

I find that I get the most natural look when I wait for them to u201cdryu201d before stamping/blending with my finger tip. By u201cdryu201d I mean I wait until I donu2019t feel the wetness, but theyu2019re still wet. That as descript as I can be lol  For reference I was Nars Barcelona and Aruba and Fenty 290 and 300

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a cute little gadget for some freckles when you feel like being imaginative. However, a little expensive for the size you get. Overall itu2019s a well worth purchase.

Most people think my freckles are real and I COVER my face in them. Using your finger to copy and paste dots so they vary in size in color is key! I payed them that way and then will spray my face with setting spray and go over it lightly with my beauty blender so they look like they are part of my skin! Love love love it and have repurchased many times. I have yet to find anything that compares.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

Itu2019s not brown itu2019s red and it wipes right off if you try to pat it do avoid it u201cdryingu201d 0/10 I will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Save your money and buy Lime Crime's freckle pen i
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am SO disappointed in Freck. I've been eyeing it for years and couldn't justify the price/size ratio but I finally splurged and wow so I regret it.  Not only does the product not look natural, it also actually crumbles off my face!? I thought maybe it was user error but I have tried it every which way for a couple weeks now and the best I get it pink Stained cheeks with little brown splotches that flake off to the touch. I don't know if mine just came really dried out, if I was sold old product or if there is just a really, REALLY large user error but if anyone knows how to make this wearable PLEASE let me know!  I really wish I could post a video here to show exactly what a mean but this literally just balls up and crumbles off my face. (The photo is a screenshot of a video I took of this happening) The only reason I am even giving it two stars if because there's still a chance I a missing something in the application but for $30 dollars maybe it should just be damn easier to apply. I have read postive reviews and I truly have no idea how people like this.  Save your money and buy lime crime's freckle pen in amber it's a natural color,  $10 cheaper, has a good bit more product and most importantly... it actually works.  Sorry to be so blunt but this is truly a massive let down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone

Even though the bottle is small I feel like it will last me a long time considering I dot a few on my face and transfer them around as I dab with my finger. They have an orangey undertone that look like natural freckles which works well with my light to medium skin tone, but if you have a deeper skin tone I would go with the other shade offered. Overall great purchase Iu2019m happy with it.

reviews.review_title: natural looking freckles that last all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product actually performed better than I expected! The small brush tip made it easy to  leave small dots or create larger ones. You can let it dry darker or blot the product to leave a lighter stain, which creates a more natural look since freckles are generally not all the same exact color. It does an excellent job of disguising small pimples/bumps as cute little freckles, too. The freckles last about twelves hours on me, and never smear even on spots that rub against my glasses or mask, which I found most impressive of all. However, I have never used this over foundation and would not be surprised if others have found that this product does not work as well on top of liquid or cream base makeup. It probably performs best on bare skin, which is how I've been using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I knew this was small. I had this u201cunrealisticu201d idea that it was going to be a certain size, but NO!!!! This is microscopic, I kid you not when I tell you I almost needed tweezers to take it out of the box. It is so tiny I am afraid of loosing it. This is $22 for a minuscule bottle. That really threw me off. When I used it it does exactly what it claims, very natural looking freckles that look cute. I just wish the price was not that steep!

Iu2019ve tried a variety of techniques and product combos with this in the hopes to get a level of success, but no luck.   It does give me a youthful appearance if you consider an explosion of pimple like dots youthful.   So a failure all round for my needs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mini is VERY small, but I wanted to try it before purchasing a full-size. I donu2019t use this for freckles, I use it for moles. My natural freckles and moles have faded into adulthood, thanks to sunscreen and skincare. But I miss them, so I gave this a try. Worth it! Pencils and eyeliners do not look realistic but this does. I used this where my natural moles used to be, and to darken the ones I still have. I love it! My family didnu2019t mention the moles specifically, but I got a ton of compliments. Iu2019m enjoying looking more like my younger self too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I unfortunately misunderstood what this product was. I anticipated a bit of a stain for a natural look that would be water proof. However, it comes off practically instantly with any water. A little worrisome for a product most wear in the summer.   I am still a bit confused as to how to apply it as well. It goes on super dark, and if/when I pat it out it turns like a red/auburn colour. I have yet to master how to make it look natural. I am a blonde with fairly tanned skin. If I figure out how to work it, before I return it that is, I might adjust my review.   The product is super expensive, in my opinion, for what you are getting. I would be willing to pay for it if it were a stain, but its not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use, easy to blend and looks natural. What more can you ask for !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had wanted something to accentuate my nature freckles and add a couple extras, I found this to be that perfect product. Can be as bold or as subtle as you'd like with precise application. A new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Would give this a zero if possible, very red based brown (Iu2019m Irish and this is too red based for me) also it dries in a odd clay mask type of way even on hydrated skin. Pass up this product, not worth the hype at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Out of all the liquid eyeliners Iu2019ve tried over the years, this is my favorite, holy grail that I can finally say Iu2019ve located, at least when it comes to eyeliner. I like the weight of it, the packaging. Very sleek, slim gold tube. Like a fancy pen. I really like the brush because I can get very precise, thin lines that I couldnu2019t achieve with other liners. I donu2019t have to dip the brush into the product very often either, the formula is workable, flexible but not thin or runny. I havenu2019t noticed any problems with transfer, and I have hooded lids so itu2019s a concern of mine. I noticed a tendency to fade after a few hours, but in the standard amount of time that liner normally fades. It just works well for me, better than anything else Iu2019ve tried. Note I have yet to try much vaunted brands like Dior, but Iu2019m currently satisfied with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These freckles really do look natural once you figure out how to appropriately place them.  However, the bottle is TINY and it wears off very fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t expecting the packaging to be so tiny, but I wonu2019t make that a complaint, just a feature. Itu2019s cute-sized, I guess. Fun-sized. I bought this because I ran out of my eye/eyebrow pencil that Iu2019d normally use to do fake freckles, plus I bought into the hype. Who hasnu2019t seen Freck ads all over social media? I am initially psyched to have a product specifically for doing freckles, rather than appropriating some other makeup product like brow gel or eyeliner pencil. I noticed I need to refill my brush with product after doing a couple of freckles and am experimenting with the proper amount of pressure to apply, but so far so good! The shade of the freckles is extremely natural looking and if I vary pressure and size and place them closer together I get a more natural look as well. I have to be careful about rubbing my nose accidentally soon after applying, because then they will fade or rub off. I didnu2019t notice them fading quickly as long as I set my makeup and keep my hands away from my face. I like it, but I canu2019t give it a full 5 stars because I havenu2019t tried other brandsu2019s versions of the freckle pen for comparison. If you like to add freckles to your look, you could use this product.

I prefer a Jackson pillow flicking method for random freckles. Also, it makes very uniform freckles that can look unnatural. It works best on bare skin and sometimes has a hard time sticking on top of foundation.  My subsequent complaint about this product is that the brand received criticism for not having a shade range but instead of coming out with a shade range, they release a separate product for people with deeper skin tones. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Freckles are so cute and natural - do spend some time testing and learning different application techniques to find the one that works for you and your routine, however. I VERY lightly touch the wand 3-5 times on one side of my nose, re-dunk and apply to the other side, then quickly pat the first side with my pointer finger (which does hold on to the pigment for an hour or two; another option is to pat with a beauty sponge), followed by the second side. This is what works for the look Iu2019m going for and YouTube has plenty of tutorials for different looks and techniques. In short, Freck is so versatile.   Freckles are pretty easily wiped off, which is good and bad. Itu2019s good because you donu2019t have to worry about a funky looking set of freckles stuck on your face all day, BUT that obviously causes problems for all-day wear. To solve: 1) top with a makeup protecting spray, 2) take Freck with you and reapply one or two freckles midday (really only important if you donu2019t want people to notice that your freckles disappear around lunchtime - I love sharing my love for Freck and donu2019t mind people knowing my freckles arenu2019t natural, but I understand if folks want to be more discrete), and 100% avoid touching your face.   The XL tube also lasts a pretty long time, I think Iu2019ve had mine for about 6 months and use it almost daily. Definitely spring for the XL, because the OG ran out in a couple of months for me.   Lastly - Freck has GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. My first tube had a small problem that made it leak just a bit, I sent a photo to customer service, who apologized so sweetly and sent a replacement, along with a discount code.
so cute and easy to use ! iu2019m so happy sephora carryu2019s this product now
